#summary Release notes for ZKGrails 0.7.6

= ZKGrails 0.7.6 Release Notes =

9 Nov 2009. This version of ZKGrails is a maintenance release for 0.7 series. It supports Grails 1.1.1 and ZK 3.6.3.

= Fixed Issues =

  * Issue 68	Upgrade ZK for 0.7 series to 3.6.3
  * Issue 69	Cherry-pick ZkBuilder's patch
  * Issue 70	Backport onEvent to call invokeMethod in GrailsComposer 
  * Issue 72	NPE on ZkBuilder with zkgrails 0.7.6
